meanings.definition: A type of traditional dwelling used by various indigenous peoples, typically characterized by a long, narrow shape and shared living spaces.
meanings.sent1: The longhouses in the village were made of wood and stretched far along the riverbank.
meanings.sent2: The longhouses of the tribe were where families lived together in harmony.
meanings.sent3: The longhouses decided to have a party and invited all the other buildings to join in the fun.
meanings.sent4: The longhouses stood like guardians, protecting the community with their sturdy walls.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the longhouses felt like stepping back in time to a simpler way of life.
